posts.postText:
I'm hosting a Minecraft SMP server! You have to buy the game before you can play SMP but it is definitely worth the 10 euros. Right now the IP is 174.0.200.9:25555 so if you own it come by and mine and craft with me, It won't be up 24/7 but I'm gonna try to get my old comp on the internet to host a server 24/7 using my main single-player save =D  It has a ton of unfinished castles and towers xD, Also do I have VIP status on forums yet, I dunno how to check :P
 Update 
I will probably host server 24/7 , It is also running on my main save game, also pigs can spawn :D 
 Update #2 
Can't play gmod and host without 400ping xD I'll host when im not playing gmod :D
